    14.

              def search

    53.

              # GET /users/new

            1
            

            

              def new
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            5
            

            

                @user = User.new

    31. 
            5

            5
            

            

                authorize @user
          
      33.

              def edit
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                authorize @user
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38.

              # PATCH/PUT /users/1 or /users/1.json
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            1
            

            

              def update
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                authorize @user
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                  if @user.update(user_params)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                    format.html { redirect_to user_url(@user), notice: "User was successfully updated." }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                    format.json { render :show, status: :ok, location: @user }
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                    format.html { render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                    format.json { render json: @user.errors, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53.

      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59.

      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60.

      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                  format.json { head :no_content }
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

              end

    app/jobs/application_job.rb

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
            

            

              # Automatically retry jobs that encountered a deadlock
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
            

            

              # retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

              # Most jobs are safe to ignore if the underlying records are no longer available
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

              # discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

            end

    app/jobs/clone_scenario_job.rb

    50.0% lines covered

    6 relevant lines. 3 lines covered and 3 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            1
            

            

            class CloneScenarioJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            1
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            1
            

            

              def perform(scenario_id)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

                scenario = Scenario.find(scenario_id)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

                clone = Scenario.find(scenario.cloned_from)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

                scenario.from(clone)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      10.

    app/jobs/generate_deal_activities_job.rb

    60.0% lines covered

    5 relevant lines. 3 lines covered and 2 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1.

            class GenerateDealActivitiesJob < ApplicationJob

              def process_file(file, import_upload)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                processed_record_count = 0
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                # Parse the XL rows
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                data = Roo::Spreadsheet.open(file.path) # open spreadsheet
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                headers = data.row(1) # get header row
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                data.each_with_index do |row, idx|
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                  next if idx.zero? # skip header row
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                  # create hash from headers and cells
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                  user_data = [headers, row].transpose.to_h

    42. 
            
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43.

      44.

                  when "InvestorAccess"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45.

      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46.

      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47.

    48.

      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error e.backtrace
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                    err_msg = "Bad import_type #{import_upload.import_type} for import_upload #{import_upload.id}"
          
      51.

                    Rails.logger.error err_msg
          
      52.

      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53.

      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                end

            class InvestmentPercentageHoldingJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            1
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            1
            

            

              def perform(investment_id)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

                investment = Investment.find(investment_id)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

                # Ensure that all investments of the investee entity are adjusted for percentage
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

                update_investment_percentage(investment)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

                # Ensure that all aggregate investments of the investee entity are adjusted for percentage
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

                update_aggregate_percentage(investment.aggregate_investment)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

                # We also update the funding round to reflect the amount_raised
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

                investment.funding_round&.save
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            1
            

            

              private
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            1
            

            

              def update_investment_percentage(investment)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                equity_investments = investment.scenario.investments.equity_or_pref
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                esop_investments = investment.scenario.investments.options_or_esop
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                equity_quantity = equity_investments.sum(:quantity)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                esop_quantity = esop_investments.sum(:quantity)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                equity_investments.each do |inv|
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                  inv.percentage_holding = (inv.quantity * 100.0) / equity_quantity
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                  inv.diluted_percentage = (inv.quantity * 100.0) / (equity_quantity + esop_quantity)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                  inv.save
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                esop_investments.each do |inv|
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                  inv.percentage_holding = 0
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                  inv.diluted_percentage = (inv.quantity * 100.0) / (equity_quantity + esop_quantity)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                  inv.save
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            1
            

            

              def update_aggregate_percentage(aggregate_investment)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                all = aggregate_investment.scenario.aggregate_investments
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                equity = all.sum(:equity)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                preferred = all.sum(:preferred)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                options = all.sum(:options)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                all.each do |ai|
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                  eq = (equity + preferred)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                  ai.percentage = 100.0 * (ai.equity + ai.preferred) / eq if eq.positive?
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                  eq_op = (equity + preferred + options)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                  ai.full_diluted_percentage = 100.0 * (ai.equity + ai.preferred + ai.options) / eq_op if eq_op.positive?
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                  ai.save
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      52.

            class AggregateInvestment < ApplicationRecord
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            1
            

            

              belongs_to :entity
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            1
            

            

              delegate :actual_scenario, to: :entity

      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            1
            

            

              has_many :investments, dependent: :destroy
          
      24.

              def self.for_investor(current_user, entity)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            86
            

            

                actual_scenario = entity.actual_scenario
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            86
            

            

                investments = actual_scenario.aggregate_investments
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                                             # Ensure the access rights for Investment
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                                             .joins(entity: %i[investors access_rights])
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                                             .merge(AccessRight.for_access_type("Investment"))
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                                             # Ensure that the user is an investor and tis investor has been given access rights
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                                             .where("entities.id=?", entity.id)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                                             .where("investors.investor_entity_id=?", current_user.entity_id)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                                             .where("investors.category=access_rights.access_to_category OR access_rights.access_to_investor_id=investors.id")
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                                             # Ensure this user has investor access
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                                             .joins(entity: :investor_accesses)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                                             .merge(InvestorAccess.approved_for(current_user, entity))
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                # return investments if investments.blank?
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47.

              def self.included(object)

              module ClassMethods

            1
            

            

                def build_tree(folders, tree = {}, map = {})
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

                  parent = nil
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

                  # puts "########### #{tree}"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                  folders.each do |f|
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                    next unless map[f.id].nil?

                    map[f.id] = node

                    if map[f.parent_folder_id].nil?
          
      20.

                      tree[f.id] = node

                def build_full_tree(folders)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug folders.collect(&:id)

                def all_parents(folders)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                  path_ids = folders.collect(&:path_ids).flatten
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                  parent_folders = Folder.where(id: path_ids).distinct.order(level: :asc)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                  build_tree(parent_folders)
          
      42.

                end
          
      43.

              def self.for_investor(current_user, entity)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            140
            

            

                actual_scenario = entity.actual_scenario
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            140
            

            

                investments = actual_scenario.investments
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                                             # Ensure the access rights for Investment
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                                             .joins(investee_entity: %i[investors access_rights])
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                                             .merge(AccessRight.for_access_type("Investment"))
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                                             # Ensure that the user is an investor and tis investor has been given access rights
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

                                             .where("entities.id=?", entity.id)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

                                             .where("investors.investor_entity_id=?", current_user.entity_id)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                                             .where("investors.category=access_rights.access_to_category OR access_rights.access_to_investor_id=investors.id")
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

                                             # Ensure this user has investor access
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                                             .joins(investee_entity: :investor_accesses)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                                             .merge(InvestorAccess.approved_for(current_user, entity))
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                # return investments if investments.blank?
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                # Is this user from an investor
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            140
            

            

                investor = Investor.for(current_user, entity).first
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                # Get the investor access for this user and this entity
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            140
            

            

                access_right = AccessRight.investments.investor_access(investor).last
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            140
            

            

                return Investment.none if access_right.nil?
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            131
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug access_right.to_json
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            131
            

            

                case access_right.metadata
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                when AccessRight::ALL
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

                  # Do nothing - we got all the investments
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            76
            

            

                  logger.debug "Access to investor #{current_user.email} to ALL Entity #{entity.id} investments"
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                when AccessRight::SELF
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                  # Got all the investments for this investor
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            54
            

            

                  logger.debug "Access to investor #{current_user.email} to SELF Entity #{entity.id} investments"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            54
            

            

                  investments = investments.where(investor_id: investor.id)
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            131
            

            

                investments
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

            end

            class HoldingPolicy < ApplicationPolicy

              class Scope < Scope

                def resolve
          
      4.

                  if user.has_cached_role?(:startup)

            class UserPolicy < ApplicationPolicy
          
      2.

    features/step_definitions/deal_investor.rb

    100.0% lines covered

    66 relevant lines. 66 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1.

            include ActionView::Helpers::NumberHelper

                @deal_investor = FactoryBot.build(:deal_investor)
